title: Master Python Full Stack Development with UNIQ Technologies
subtitle: Become a highly skilled Python Full Stack Developer with UNIQ Technologies. Learn Python, Django, REST API, React, and SQL while building complete end-to-end web applications. With hands-on projects, experienced mentors, and 100% placement support, this course prepares you to become job-ready for top IT companies.

faq.question: What is a Python Full Stack Developer course?
faq.answer: This course trains you in backend (Python, Django, REST API) and frontend (React JS) development so you can build complete web applications from scratch.

faq.question: Who can join this course?
faq.answer: Any graduate, fresher, or working professional can join. We start from basics — no prior programming skills required.

faq.question: What are the job opportunities after this course?
faq.answer: You can become a Python Developer, Django Developer, Full Stack Developer, Backend Developer, or REST API Engineer.

faq.question: What tools will I learn?
faq.answer: Python, Django, REST Framework, React JS, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL, Git & GitHub, Postman.

faq.question: How long is the course?
faq.answer: The duration is 4–6 months depending on your selected batch (weekday/weekend).

faq.question: Does UNIQ Technologies provide placement support?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide 100% placement support until you get placed — with daily interview opportunities.

faq.question: Can I rejoin classes if I need revision?
faq.answer: Yes! You can rejoin any future batch for free — lifetime learning access is provided.

faq.question: Is online training available?
faq.answer: Yes, both online and offline classes are available with flexible timings.

faq.question: Can I switch from online to offline mode?
faq.answer: Yes, you can switch anytime without extra charges.

faq.question: Is Python still in demand?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Python powers web development, AI, automation, data science, and backend engineering — making Python developers highly employable.

faq.question: Will I receive a certificate?
faq.answer: You will receive a Course Completion Certificate and an Internship Certificate recognized by top companies.

faq.question: Why should I choose UNIQ Technologies?
faq.answer: We offer real-time projects, top MNC trainers, lifetime learning access, and guaranteed placement support.

faq.question: How can I enroll?
faq.answer: You can register through www.uniqjobs.co.in or visit our branches in Chennai or Bangalore.
